items.title: Risk of prompt injection in issue validation
items.summary: 症状/環境が近い投稿。エラー文と権限・prefix・PATHが焦点になりやすい。
items.reply_draft:
I feel you — this kind of error is usually about permissions / install location / PATH / caches.
I summarized a step-by-step checklist (with common mistakes + fixes) here: https://mikann20041029.github.io/solve-multi-git-push-rejected-permission-denied-202602101652/
If you can share OS + Node/npm versions and the exact command, it's easier to pinpoint.

meta.title: git push rejected permission denied をまとめて直す（権限/環境/手順）
meta.desc: 直近1ヶ月の投稿（10〜20件）を元に、原因パターン→チェックリスト→具体手順→FAQまで1ページに整理。
